p: Stool samples were prepared with phosphate-buffered saline solution to a final concentration of 10%. Viral RNA was extracted from 200 μL of a 10% stool suspension using the Viral Nucleic Acid Extraction Kit II (Geneaid, China), according to the manufacturer’s instructions. The RNA was then subjected to one-step real-time RT-PCR targeting NV sequences at the ORF1/ORF2 junction for NV detection, as described previously [ 25].
